#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int x;
	double w,y,z;
	cin>>x>>y;
	if((double)(y-x)>=0.50)
	{
		if(x%5==0 )
	{
		y=(y-(double)x-0.50);
	//	std::cout<<std::fixed;
	//std::cout<<std::setprecision(2)<<y<<'\n';
	} 
}
std::cout<<std::fixed;
	std::cout<<std::setprecision(2)<<y;
return 0;
}
